posts.author: kek_saved_the_world
posts.title: “Personally I think the right should tone down the rhetoric.”

posts.raw_content:
No more memes. No more vigils. No more half-measures.

We are not in a left-right battle, we are in a communist vs. every one else battle. 

What we have seen these past few years is the culmination of decades of their infiltration and indoctrination in all facets of society, especially those that have societal levers of control. 

It will only  get worse as they have been emboldened and have been making inroads for years. So they will only accelerate. 

Unless they are stopped completely, they will continue on indefinitely. Please understand that they absolutely do not care what, or who, they have to sacrifice to achieve their goals. 

These organizations and their ideology must be extirpated. The time for negotiation is over—and negotiation was never truly possible to begin with.
